name: Puzzle Pong
description:
DISCLAIMER: We encourage you to download either the Windows or MacOS versions of the game. You can find the download links here below on the games page.

You are in control of two or more paddles. Only one paddle is active at a time. The active paddle is the paddle in the same section of the map as the ball. The goal of the game is to bounce the glowing ball into the green end portal. To progress to the next stage. There are currently 10 levels to proceed through. If you get stuck on a level there is a level select option in the main menu. We also encourage you to check out the 5 bonus levels. 

Controls
Mouse to control the paddles or Up and Down arrows on keyboard.

WASD to use the ball thruster.

P to Pause the game

Royalty Free Music from Bensound
